abstract: Federal Judge Jesse M Furman rejects request to replace Robert C Hilliard, one of lead lawyers for plaintiffs suing General Motors over defective ignition switch, and refuses to undo $275 million settlement reached between GM and Hilliard.

headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; Bid to Replace Plaintiffs’ Lawyer in G.M. Recall Case Is Rejected
headline.main: Effort to Replace a Plaintiffs’ Lawyer in G.M. Case Is Rejected

snippet: One of the lawyers said another was acting improperly, but a Manhattan judge said there was little evidence to support the claims.
lead_paragraph: One of the lawyers said another was acting improperly, but a Manhattan judge said there was little evidence to support the claims.
